rawText:
HARISH SEKAR   
dsharish@outlook.com | +91 96290 10760  
  
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in dotnet core enterprise 
application development, cloud integration, and microservices architecture. Proven expertise in 
leading complex ERP integrations, designing scalable solutions using Azure technologies, Azure 
Devops and implementing modern architectural patterns including Saga microservices. Strong 
background in Backend development with demonstrated success in migrating legacy systems to 
cloud-native architectures and dotnet core architecture.  
  
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
Senior Software Engineer | Nublar Technology, Bengaluru  
January 2023 – Present  
Project: MyCarrier - Enterprise ERP Integration Platform  
• Technical Leadership: Spearheaded productization initiative by designing and implementing 
Saga architecture-based dotnet core microservices, successfully migrating customer-specific 
Logic Apps. 
• Led comprehensive ERP integration solutions for Sage100 and QuickBooks Online using  
• Azure Logic Apps. 
• Developed Azure App Services and Function Apps to bridge ERP systems with Logic Apps. 
• Integrated multiple Truckload APIs within Azure Logic Apps to streamline logistics and 
• transportation workflows. 
• Architected Azure Blob Storage mechanism to optimize API call efficiency, reducing  
• order creation API calls by 60%.  
• DevOps Implementation: Adopted Kubernetes orchestration and Grafana monitoring for 
enhanced system observability and scalability.  
• Quality Assurance: Implemented comprehensive automation testing frameworks, improving 
deployment reliability  
 
Software Engineer| Nublar Technology, Bengaluru  
January 2021 – December 2022  
Project: Trimble - Transportation & Logistics Solutions  
• Developed .NET API endpoints to integrate with Boomi middleware for EDI transform  
• Contributed to architecture decisions and technical design reviews  
• Developed core .NET components for file processing dispatcher and routing  
  
  

 
Software Engineer| Nublar Technology, Bengaluru  
November 2019 – December 2020  
Project: Kuebix - Azure Integrations  
• Designed and developed Azure Logic Apps to automate business workflows and integrate thirdparty 
systems  
• Built Azure Function Apps to orchestrate and automate Logic App executions  
• Implemented comprehensive testing frameworks and debugging processes to ensure code quality 
and reliability  
• Successfully onboarded 15+ new clients to Azure platform, managing end-to-end migration 
processes  
• Collaborated with stakeholders to identify critical business requirements while balancing design 
and functional performance  
Software Developer | Honeywell Technology Solutions  
November 2018 – October 2019  
Project: SIR Tool - Build Management System  
• Developed .NET Core web application enabling cross-functional teams to submit builds for 
QA testing  
• Diagnosed and resolved critical application bugs, maintaining 99.5% uptime in production 
environment  
• Improved bug detection efficiency and established 4-hour SLA for critical issue resolution • 
Automated email reporting system, reducing manual effort and improving stakeholder 
communication  
Junior Software Developer | Ebase Software Solutions October 2017 – October 2018  
Project: PRISM - Insurance Process Management  
• Built .NET Core web application streamlining workflows between insurance companies and 
healthcare providers  
• Automated Excel template generation process, reducing processing time from hours to 
minutes • Implemented robust data access layer using Entity Framework Core with 
optimized database queries  
• Participated in database schema design and optimization, improving query performance by 
40%  
Junior Software Developer | Ebase Software Solutions  
February 2017 – September 2017 Project: X-Space - HR Interview Management System  
• Developed .NET Core web application for managing technical interview processes  
• Integrated Python-based quiz engine with C# backend for automated candidate assessment  
• Analysed business requirements and translated them into technical specifications and user 
stories  
• Created RESTful web services using C# for seamless frontend-backend communication  

 
 
Associate Developer | Ebase Software Solutions  
October 2016 – January 2017  
Project: X-Cloud - Learning Management System  
• Implemented Moodle-based Learning Management System for enterprise training 
programs • Prepared detailed project proposals including risk assessment, timeline 
estimation, and resource planning  
• Maintained comprehensive architecture documentation and technical specifications  
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure project deliverables met quality 
standards  
  
EDUCATION  
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science  
Anna University, Chennai, India | CGPA: 7.6/10  
  
TECHNICAL EXPERTISE   
Category  Technologies  
Programming Languages  C#  
Frameworks &  
Technologies  
.NET Core, Entity Framework, ASP.NET MVC, Microservices  
Cloud Platforms  
Microsoft Azure (Logic Apps, Function Apps, App Services, Blob 
Storage)  
Architecture Patterns  Saga Pattern, Microservices, MVC, RESTful APIs  
Container Technologies  Kubernetes, Docker  
Monitoring & DevOps  Grafana, Azure DevOps, CI/CD Pipelines  
ERP Systems  Sage100, QuickBooks Online, NetSuite  
Databases  SQL Server, MySQL  
Development Tools  Visual Studio, Git, Azure Portal  
Testing  Automation Testing, Unit Testing, Integration Testing  
  
  
  

  
  
KEY ACHIEVEMENTS  
✓ Led successful migration of legacy ERP integrations to modern Saga microservices architecture  
✓ Designed and implemented Azure Blob Storage optimization reducing API calls by 60%  
✓ Successfully migrated 15+ clients to Azure platform with zero downtime  
✓ Improved deployment reliability by  through automation testing implementation  
✓ Established technical leadership in microservices design and Kubernetes adoption  
✓ Reduced bug detection time  through implementation of automated testing processes  
✓ Maintained 99.5% system uptime across multiple enterprise applications  
  
PROFESSIONAL INTERESTS  
• Microservices Architecture and Design Patterns  
• Cloud-Native Application Development and DevOps  
• Enterprise Integration Patterns and ERP Systems  
• Kubernetes and Container Orchestration  
• System Observability and Performance Monitoring
